name: Entrusting this World to Actual Idols
name_original: Entrusting this World to Actual Idols
description:
For the Touhou Fan Game Jam 7

Keiki's been watching to much of them idol animes and decided the best course for Gensokyo is to turn everyone into an idol. Your goal is to try and hire everyone possible. Gain funds by putting up shows and gaining popularity. Train your idols with your funds and create the ultimate idol group, watch out for rivals tho.

Instructions:

  • Mouse and keyboard
  • Click on stuff

Was not fully tested for bugs and spelling mistakes. if the game crashes please report thanks.

Other Information:

  • Save/load states work, they don't really say that it saved/loaded but it did. the directory of the save is displayed in the game so you can mess with it if you want.
  • Just noticed "inspirations" in the screenshot is misspelled.  Nice.
  • Also just Realized I added no sound effects >_>
